text: Thanks! Wow, that seems like a lot! I'm on Elvanse, so it's slow release Lisdexamfetamine. Doc says it's not accumulative so I can't see *why* I would need to take a break for physical reasons - but of course mental reasons could be important too! Must remember to ask her.

metadata.raw_text: Thanks! Wow, that seems like a lot! I'm on Elvanse, so it's slow release Lisdexamfetamine. Doc says it's not accumulative so I can't see *why* I would need to take a break for physical reasons - but of course mental reasons could be important too! Must remember to ask her.
